extendedInfo.description: ChessGenius, award winning chess program. The author's chess programs have won ten World Championships.-Display of thinking-Hint-Tutor-Full take back & forward-Chess clocks-Big opening book & named openings-Set up position-33 playing levels including easy & blitz-Database. Save / load games to PGN databases on SD card-Copy and paste PGN games to clipboard-Simple, elegant user interface

reviews.title: Super powerful opponent
reviews.comment: Simply awesome! As good or on par with shredder, having a pocket grandmaster for under $8 bucks is simply insane.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: What to say? It has everything you can expect from a phone chess program. Sometimes I only wish it were \"funnier\", that you could enable funny sounds (think Chess Pro 5) or something more enthusiastic when you win. Or more choice of boards and pieces. But, apart from those minutiae, it is a great game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Chess App
reviews.comment: One of my favorites. Identifies openings. Can load games from pgn and play from any position. Many difficulty levels. Clocks, move list, etc. Top quality, pro features. Thank you!
reviews.author: Tom Amlin

reviews.title: Shredder is better
reviews.comment: Shredder is much stronger and better. I recommend shredder than this if you looking for strong algorithm and tactics. I played shredder (2600 level) against pc deep fritz13 (level 13 depth) and shredder wins easily and draw with (level 14 depth). Also I played chessgenius level (think in 5 second) against deep fritz13 (level 10) and it lose easily. I will ask for refund.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: The appvworks very well with a strong chess engine.  If you like to play chess this is a great app.
reviews.author: Chandrashekhar Joshi

reviews.title: Fair...
reviews.comment: I paid for it but I\'m not too happy with it. To set up a board for a study is three screens away. I\'m still baffled as to how to open a pgn database. In the analysis level it gives a single line... Good opponent, definitely!
reviews.author: Alan OBrien

reviews.title: Best engine for phones.
reviews.comment: Been using it for ten years and its my engine of choice.
reviews.author: Ike Garcia

reviews.title: Chess Genius
reviews.comment: Very strong. Overall my favorite chess app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great chess app. Helped me go pro in ches
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good engine.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I\'ve played around 10 different chess games and this one is my favorite.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Like the UI but even on instant CPU is too strong.also app can not backup. Fails to backup.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent Chess Program
reviews.comment: Have been using this app since June 2011 when I loaded it onto my new Sprint Droid XPRT. Possibly one of the first new apps I installed. Works very well and have had no bug problems. Wonderful to play with when stuck somewhere waiting for a bus or plane or whatever. I looked at -several- other chess programs first -- this one was clearly the best.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Chess program.
reviews.comment: I have used this on my Palm Pilot and was amazed at how strong it was. On my Droid X, it\'s the strongest chess program in my collection.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The tradition of ChessGenius continues
reviews.comment: I\'ve had ChessGenius on numerous platforms and now on Android too. It\'s a good chess partner and compared to Shredder I like that it displays the name of the opening.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best chess opponent
reviews.comment: This app is prefect for a nice challenging opponent, in a small, low resource package. Couldn\'t ask for better support either.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Good but could be better...
reviews.comment: The graphics are NOT HD like Shredder but unlike Shredder it does support landscape mode for tablet which is important to me! It would be perfect if it had HD graphics, supported pgn variations and annotations. All in all, one of my favorite chess apps but there is room for improvement. Also CTG opening book support would be a great...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent Chess Program
reviews.comment: I used Chess Genius on my PC in the mid 90s when it was still one the best programs around. The Android version is very good indeed, continues that strong tradition, and seems to play in a very logical way which makes it useful for analyzing games. In terms of playing strength it is probably somewhere around International Master level. Excellent!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Strange installation location
reviews.comment: Plays good chess.  I miss some of the old Palm features like playing someone over Bluetooth.  Don\'t understand why it installs to app-private tho.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really nice. I would like to see a step by step opening guide. Also an App2SD feature would be great to have.
reviews.author: A Google User
